teaser: Should U.S. GDP count 'The Bachelorette'? The latest GDP estimate is out today and it's getting a major overhaul. Senator Angus King of Maine tells us why he wants to make banking boring again. A new Ford F-150 is being made to run on natural gas. And why it's important to remember the names of the people you work with.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 31, 2013
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Wednesday, July 31, 2013
description: Should U.S. GDP count 'The Bachelorette'? The latest GDP estimate is out today and it's getting a major overhaul. Senator Angus King of Maine tells us why he wants to make banking boring again. A new Ford F-150 is being made to run on natural gas. And why it's important to remember the names of the people you work with.
byline: Bruce Johnson, Sally Herships, Gigi Douban, David Brancaccio and Mitchell Hartman
